name: phonebook
description: a large phonebook of hot ladies

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../part2/part2.16-17-phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/part3-phonebook
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
